sentences.en: a triple bill of horror movies
sentences.cn: 三部恐怖电影的连续放映

sentences.en: a triple bypass heart operation
sentences.cn: 三重心脏搭桥手术

sentences.en: a triple bypass operation
sentences.cn: 接三通管的手术

sentences.en: a triple heart bypass operation
sentences.cn: 心脏三处分流手术

sentences.en: a triple murder investigation
sentences.cn: 对一宗三重谋杀案的调查

sentences.en: He received triple wages for all his extra work.
sentences.cn: 由于额外的工作他领取了三倍的工资.

sentences.en: He vibrated a triple tongue, and showed a triple row of teeth.
sentences.cn: 它摇动着分成了三叉的舌头, 龇出三排牙齿.

sentences.en: In 1882 Germany, Austria, and Italy formed the Triple Alliance.
sentences.cn: 1882年，德国、奥地利和意大利组成了三国同盟。

sentences.en: The castle was originally surrounded by a triple wall, only one of which remains.
sentences.cn: 这座城堡最初由三重墙环绕而成，现在仅存一道。

sentences.en: The company has tripled in size .
sentences.cn: 这家公司的规模已扩大了两倍。

sentences.en: The Jane's "Triple X Album" came out in 1986, and wasn't much cop actually.
sentences.cn: 简在1986年推出了《XXX》专辑，但事实上并不怎么样。

sentences.en: The kitchen is triple the size it once was.
sentences.cn: 厨房面积扩为原先的3倍。

sentences.en: The merger puts the firm in a position to triple its earnings.
sentences.cn: 合并可使公司利润增长两倍。

sentences.en: The mine reportedly had an accident rate triple the national average.
sentences.cn: 据报道，该矿事故发生率是全国平均水平的3倍。

sentences.en: the triple world champion
sentences.cn: 三连冠世界冠军

sentences.en: The volume V is given in terms of the scalar triple product.
sentences.cn: 体积V能用数量三乘积表示.

sentences.en: Three of my veins had furred up and I needed a triple bypass.
sentences.cn: 我有三条静脉出现了堵塞，需要做个三支搭桥手术。

sentences.en: Triple gun - decks mounted sixty - four bronze cannon.
sentences.cn: 三层的火炮甲板上架有64门青铜加农炮.

sentences.en: Twelve is the triple of four.
sentences.cn: 十二是四的三倍数.

sentences.en: We expect to triple our profits next year.
sentences.cn: 我们期望明年利润增加两倍。

sentences.en: We're suffering a triple whammy at the moment.
sentences.cn: 我们目前正遭受到了接二连三的打击。

words.tran_cn: 三倍；三位一体；三个一幅
使增至三倍；增至三倍（triple的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 三A（由三个表现出众的草坪型高羊茅品种科学配比而成，是市场上很受欢迎的高羊茅混播组合）；三A级；最高信用评级；美国汽车协会（AAA，American Automobile Association）
三联点；三重接头；三向连接构造
三杀（使攻方三个球员同时被杀出局）

trans.tran_cn: 三倍的，三方的，三部分的
trans.tran_en: having three parts or involving three groups, people, events etc
to increase by three times as much, or to make something do this
to increase by three times as much, or to make something do this
